alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Kershaw; Northern Lancaster; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lancaster, northern Chesterfield and north central Kershaw Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wadesboro to near Mcconnells. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Pageland, Chesterfield, Elgin, Heath Springs, USC Lancaster, Irwin, Andrew Jackson State Park, Van Wyck, Buford, Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Jefferson, Ruby, Patrick, Mount Croghan, Chesterfield Ruby Middle School, Bell Town Fire Station, Arrowood Estates and Faith Christian School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; Kershaw; Northern Lancaster; Southern Lancaster
